title: Lab01 : Creating Your First Cluster
description: Creating your first cluster with a basic experience can be a bit challenging. Also, it is very dependent on your machine's hardware, because you need good RAM and memory to get started with Minikube or Kubeadm installation. If you have already activated your sandbox, please skip this lab. In case you are still struggling, then this is a step-by-step guide to help you activate your first cluster without a cost and depending on your hardware.
